attributes.action: Stop the Premier league's pay per view charges.
attributes.additional_details: They are putting certain games on free and others on pay per view. Before Covid all of this was within your subscription. Now because we can’t go to games they are putting more on tv but now charging extra on top of a very expensive subscription. This is unethical. We already pay a tv licence. This is so so wrong in so many ways. They are exploiting fans to get more in there coffers. And we are all facing uncertain futures financially right now.
attributes.background: This is totally unacceptable, we already pay very high subscriptions and now they are squeezing more money from people who love there football that can’t currently watch teams for obvious reasons. Plus people are losing jobs and on furlough. This is pure greed and should be stopped immediately.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for broadcasters and the football authorities.
